item.title: Python Launcher（for Windows）
item.description: 1. 什么是 Python Launcher 原文： New in version 3.3. The Python launcher for Windows is a utility which aids in locating and executing of different Python versions. It allows scripts (or the command-line) to indicate a preference for a specific Python version, and will locate and execute that version. Unlike the PATH variable, the launcher will correctly select the most appropriate version of Python. It will
